description: Wolf is shocked to find his new trainer is a girl. After Wolf makes a sexist comment, coach Ariel challenges him to a match where things get hot and sweaty. But Ariel's moves are too much for Wolf, and he finds himself pinned to the mat at Ariel's mercy. Made to suck her throbbing tranny cock, his submission soon leads to a vigorous ass-fucking from his new mistress.
title: BONUS UPDATE
